job title: Data Scientist (m/f) with focus on Time Series and Complex Data Structures
job description:
Data Scientist (m/f) with focus on Time Series and Complex Data Structures

Your tasks
  • Analysis
    of complex data sets with focus on time series
  • Conception,
    design, implementation and optimization of intuitive dashboards and reports
    based on the needs of customers and internal departments
  • Proof-of-Concepts for advanced analyses with new
    technologies
Our requirements
  • Extensive
    experience and interest in Data Cleansing, Data Exploration, Data Analysis, Data
    Modeling and simple and innovative presentation of analysis results
  • Very
    good knowledge of statistical and mathematical evaluations, as well as confidence
    in handling current technologies such as ElasticSearc, Kibana
  • Desire
    to understand the interests of customers and to support them as best as
    possible
  • Strong
    technical understanding for complex systems
  • Knowledge
    in energy market, energy management and Smart Home (desirable)
  • Very
    good knowledge of German and English
What we are offering
  • A permanent working contract
  • The chance to do things
    that really matter
  • We let your ideas become
    real products
  • Working in a team with high
    expertise and market knowledge
  • Flat hierarchies and short
    decision paths
  • Open, friendly and helpful
    colleagues across all departments
  • Fair conditions and
    flexible working time models
